hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Recovery Heart#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers the #Guard House#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the way of the hero.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the way of the hero.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that ##the Sacred Forest Meadow## has #3# major items.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Boomerang#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Recovery Heart#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that scoring 1500 in #horseback archery# grants #an Ice Trap#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #at the Desert Colossus#, skulltulas at night hold...^ #a Shadow Temple Small Key# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #the Serenade of Water#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that racing #Damp's ghost# rewards...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Hookshot#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #the Song of Storms#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that looking into darkness may find darkness looking back into you.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Deku Tree## has #5# major items.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Game Key# and #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #a Water Temple Small Key# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #frozen cavern# echoes with #a Deku Stick#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Boomerang#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Spirit Temple#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Mirror Shield# can be found in #the Market#.

SFM (Saria).text: When ASM is used to code a randomizer they should call it ASMR.

ToT (Left).text: They say that inside the #lakeside lab# a person and a spider hold...^ #a Ganon's Castle Small Key# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that ##the Lost Woods## has #5# major items.

ToT (Right).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #the Bottom of the Well#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the path to #the Tower#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Water Trial Left Chest

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Huge Rupee# and #Bombchus (5 pieces)#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #Volvagia#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.
